com.github.kaiwinter.androidremotenotifications

Class RemoteNotifications

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kaiwinter.androidremotenotifications.RemoteNotifications

  • public final class RemoteNotifications
extends java.lang.Object
    The starting class of this library. Construct an instance with the URL to your JSON file on a server and call updateNotificationsFromServer(UpdatePolicy). This will load the configured notifications and store it in the libraries store. Call showPendingNotificationsToUser(boolean) to automatically show notifications to the user by an AlertDialog.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteNotifications

        public RemoteNotifications(android.content.Context context,
                           java.net.URL serverUrl)
        Constructs a new RemoteNotifications. The Notifications from the server and the last server update timestamp will be stored in a Shared Preferences file with the name . To change the name use RemoteNotifications(Context, URL, String).
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        serverUrl - The absolute URL to the notification JSON on a server (or file system), not null.

      • RemoteNotifications

        public RemoteNotifications(android.content.Context context,
                           java.net.URL serverUrl,
                           java.lang.String sharedPreferenceName)
        Constructs a new RemoteNotifications.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        serverUrl - The absolute URL to the notification JSON on a server (or file system), not null.
        sharedPreferenceName - The file name to use for the Shared Preferences file.

    • Method Detail

      • showPendingNotificationsToUser

        public void showPendingNotificationsToUser()
        Shows all due notifications. If a server update of the notifications is running this call gets scheduled and is executed automatically after the update has finished.
        See Also:
        showPendingNotificationsToUser(boolean)

      • showPendingNotificationsToUser

        public void showPendingNotificationsToUser(boolean showAll)
        Shows due notifications. If a server update of the notifications is running this call gets scheduled and is executed automatically after the update has finished.
        Parameters:
        showAll - if true all pending notification dialogs will be shown (may result in bad user experience if several dialogs are popping up). If false only one dialog will be shown on each call of this method.

      • updateNotificationsFromServer

        public void updateNotificationsFromServer(UpdatePolicy updatePolicy,
                                          NotificationLoaderFinishListener listener)
        Starts an AsyncTask which loads the notifications from the server, removes local notifications which doesn't exist anymore and adds new one.
        Parameters:
        updatePolicy - Use this parameter to reduce the number of server calls, not null.
        listener - a NotificationLoaderFinishListener which is called after the update of the notifications finished.

      • updateNotificationsFromServer

        public void updateNotificationsFromServer(UpdatePolicy updatePolicy)
        Starts an AsyncTask which loads the notifications from the server, removes local notifications which doesn't exist anymore and adds new one.
        Parameters:
        updatePolicy - Use this parameter to reduce the number of server calls, not null.

      • getPreferenceStore

        public NotificationStore getPreferenceStore()
        Returns:
        the internally used store of the notifications

      • start

        public static void start(android.content.Context context,
                         java.net.URL url,
                         UpdatePolicy updatePolicy)
        Convenience method to update and show notifications.
        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        url - the URL of the JSON file
        updatePolicy - the time between server updates
